definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
compassion, duty, propriety and integrity (idiom); all the traditional virtues/mainly used sarcastically, to mean hypocritical

sentences.english: Now there is no moral to the story here.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，仁義道德都是虛的，能賺到錢纔是真的。

sentences.english: Kindness, righteousness, propriety , wisdom and trustworthiness. These five virtues should be strictly adhere to and should not be violated.
sentences.chinese: 仁義禮智信是做人的五條準則，必須遵守，不容紊亂。

sentences.english: and put on the new self, created to be like God in true righteousness and holiness” (NIV).
sentences.chinese: 這新人是照着神的形像造的，有真理的仁義和聖潔。

sentences.english: This group aims at uniting all Yan Yee Tong brothers together.
sentences.chinese: 本聯盟旨在團結所有仁義堂兄弟。

sentences.english: Then he will thank you, and it will be regarded as a righteous act in the sight of the Lord your God.
sentences.chinese: 這在永恆主你的上帝面前就算爲你的仁義了。

sentences.english: So to follow Confucianism often leads people into confusion.
sentences.chinese: 所以遵循仁義忠孝道德常常會使人陷入困惑。

sentences.english: Ren injects As for the rate of animal food, will cannibalism , that the world perishes.
sentences.chinese: 仁義充塞而至於率獸食人，人將相食，謂之亡天下。

sentences.english: Human righteousness, but in the righteous cause of the front, to put aside personal affair.
sentences.chinese: 爲人仁義，但在大義面前，能夠放下個人私情。

sentences.english: Chinese culture of Confucianism, Buddhism, Taoism three studies, the most follow xing) is not letter.
sentences.chinese: 中國文化的儒釋道三家國學，最遵從仁義禮智信。

sentences.english: To receive the instruction of wisdom, justice, and judgment, and equity;
sentences.chinese: 使人處世，領受智慧，仁義，公平，正直的訓誨。

sentences.english: To do justice and judgment is more acceptable to the LORD than sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 行仁義公平，比獻祭更蒙耶和華悅納。

sentences.english: Virtue is no more than a luxury.
sentences.chinese: 仁義道德，也是一種奢侈。

sentences.english: Then you will understand what is right and just and fair-every good path.
sentences.chinese: 你也必明白仁義，公平，正直，一切的善道。

sentences.english: That thinking it a apotheosis as benignancy of Tang's annihilating Xia, was purely the Confucian fudge.
sentences.chinese: 後世以湯伐葛爲行仁義之師的典範，純是儒家之造作。

sentences.english: According to their standards, Jie and Robber Zhi were evil persons, while Zen Can and Shi You were kind.
sentences.chinese: 在他們仁義的標準裏，壞人有桀及跖，好人有曾史等。

sentences.english: Melech means King in Hebrew,zedek means righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 麥基是希伯來語裏國王的意思，洗德是仁義的意思。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
righteousness/virtuous cause/a woman's marriage/main points of a piece of writing
saint/sage/refers to Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3]/the current reigning Emperor
(Confucianism) rites and music (the means of regulating society)
Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
see a worthy, think to imitate (idiom, from Analects); emulate the virtuous/Follow the example of a virtuous and wise teacher.
surname Li/abbr. for 禮記|礼记[Li3 ji4], Classic of Rites
